Message.Title: Tobacco Smoke Enemas (1750s -1810s)
Message.Msg: The tobacco enema was used to infuse tobacco smoke into a patient's rectum for various medical purposes, primarily the resuscitation of drowning victims. A rectal tube inserted into the #$%$ was connected to a fumigator and bellows that forced the smoke towards the rectum. The warmth of the smoke was thought to promote respiration, but doubts about the credibility of tobacco enemas led to the popular phrase "blowin' smoke up your axx." It was reintroduced in Washington, by the Obama Administration more than 3 years ago. It will now be a big part of the New Health Care Program.

Message.Title: THE COMING ECONOMIC COLLAPSE
Message.Msg: The U.S. economy is teetering on the brink of another recession. The bad news is that if it goes down again, there won’t be much we can do to save ourselves. Like a weary heavyweight, if it hits the mat again, it’s down for good. The expansion has been terribly disappointing—growth is hardly 2 percent and jobs creation barely keeps unemployment steady at 8.2. Manufacturing and exports powered the recovery but are now weakening. Consumer spending and existing home sales are flagging, because policymakers failed to aid underwater homeowners as generously as the banks. Read more: http:

Message.Title: SELL CONFIRMED TODAY 7/20/12 - Cash is King
Message.Msg: The market is poised for a bearish move. It opened today with a gap-down and the day’s activity resulted in a close lower than the open. This is one of our valid bearish confirmation criteria. The significant failure of the previous BUY signal is unfortunately confirmed too. Our shot went away this time. It is a fact that such signal failures are more unlikely for higher rated stocks, but it is not possible to deal with all the vagaries of the stock market. Selling was the right move today in order to prevent further losses. If you sold, keep away from this stock until the confirmation of a new signal. Maybe you did not have time to follow the session? Well, it is a bit late, but not too late. You may still find suitable prices for selling your shares in the following sessions. The market is an inviting one for short-sellers. Risk lovers may now go for short sale. The market is already moving on the side of shorts ignoring the confirmed bullish patterns. This is a copy and paste I stumbled on concerning BAC sentiment and trading values.

Message.Title: ETF's
Message.Msg: Exchange traded funds (ETFs) trade just like stocks, but instead of ”shares” investors are actually buying and selling ”units”. These ”units” can be traded back and forth just like stocks, but can also be created or destroyed to accommodate investor demand. Creation of new units will mean the underlying holdings of the ETF need to be purchased, while destruction of units involves selling underlying holdings, so large flows can also impact the individual components held within ETFs.

Topic.Title: Raise Your Hand If You Understand the Impact of a Euro Collapse!!!

Message.Msg: You are both wrong. You are wrong, because there is nothing backing up USD, except for US military, but those with nuclear weapons are not scared at all. That is why you see more and more bilateral agreement for trade outside of USD. . US has outsourced virtually all of its production capacity, which required financial engineering/fraud to substitute. But that died in 2008. Hence, military power is the only one holding the currency. Not to mention that the FED is increasingly the soul source of buying US bonds. Traderx is wrong, because he thinks if Euro collapses, the world will end. Currencies don't matter, because they are just means of exchange. Europe, unlike the US, has preserved its production capacity, which means that no matter which currencies it uses (whether as a whole or on individual country basis, they will still continue to produce and trade. If you are long BofA, you are dead. You will never recoup your losses. If you are shorts, you just need to get in and out timely.

Topic.Title: Raise Your Hand If You Understand the Impact of a Euro Collapse!!!

Message.Msg: The reason US equities will go down has nothing to do with Europe or Euro. Equities will go down because the dollar needs to go up to $24 (UUP) to trigger QE3, and when QE3 starts, we are going to have a rally. As you could see, for the past year, the caretakers didn't even need much printing to keep the market from imploding. Words alone have been enough. Paul Krugman is right on one point only: country's level of debt has nothing to do with its ability to borrow. UK has much higher debt than Spain, Greece and Italy, and yet, the Brits are enjoying lowest interest, This Euro thing has been engineered to prop USD. The caretakers were getting desperate to bring up USD, nothing seemed to work, so they decided to tank Europe...

Message.Title: When it comes to the economy, it's a slam-dunk for Romney!
Message.Msg: WASHINGTON – Despite concerted Democratic attacks on his business record, Republican challenger Mitt Romney scores a significant advantage over President Obama when it comes to managing the economy, reducing the federal budget deficit and creating jobs, a national USA TODAY/Gallup Poll finds. By Charles Dharapak, AP Mitt Romney is preferred over President Obama on the economy, despite attacks on his record at Bain Capital, according to a new USA TODAY/Gallup Poll. Sponsored LinksBy more than 2-1, 63%-29%, those surveyed say Romney's background in business, including his tenure at the private equity firm Bain Capital, would cause him to make good decisions, not bad ones, in dealing with the nation's economic problems over the next four years. The findings raise questions about Obama's strategy of targeting Bain's record in outsourcing jobs and hammering Romney for refusing to commit to releasing more than two years of his tax returns. Instead, Americans seem focused on the economy, where disappointment with the fragile recovery and the 8.2% unemployment rate are costing the president
